Subject: How to make LN2 Ice Cream
Description: Learn the basics of making liquid nitrogen ice cream! Equipment; safety; proportions; how the mix should taste before freezing; pouring; stirring; timing of mix-ins; recipe adjustments for non-dairy and non-sugar alternatives.  Hands-on training as space permits, and of course, ice cream samples will be provided!  Speakers include:Sarah Elkins, Paul Salkie - Track: Food  - Duration: 1 hour and 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: none

Subject: LN2 Ice Cream Out of the Box
Description: We have a lot of ingredients to use up!  And more to teach about LN2!  Come learn and taste some more.  All sessions will offer dairy-free and sugar-free options upon request.  Speakers include:Sarah Elkins, Phil Salkie - Track: Food  - Duration: 1 hour and 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: none

Subject: LN2 Sunday Morning Brunch
Description: Come enjoy (and help us make) breakfast ice creams, from coffee ice cream to Captain Crunch!  All LN2 sessions will offer dairy-free and sugar-free options upon request.  Speakers include:Sarah Elkins, Phil Salkie - Track: Food  - Duration: 1 hour and 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: none

Subject: PowerPoint Karaoke
Description: Players will try out their improv chops one at a time with a random slide deck which they get to present to the audience (with a time limit). Each player hangs a compelling or funny narrative on whatever art, charts, technobabble, or self-improvement jargon comes up on the slides. Volunteer from the audience! Prizes awarded!  Speakers include:Sarah Elkins, Cylithria Dubois - Track: Gaming  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: Projector

Subject: Great Engineers: Gotta Catch 'Em All
Description: Is tech hiring like Pokemon?  How do you hire *and* hang on to good people?  What do recruiting and retention have to do with each other?  If you're looking for a job, does 'passion' in the job ad sound inspiring, or like 80-hour work weeks are expected?  The panelists have each been on both sides of the interview table.  Come hear their perspectives and share your own.  Speakers include:Sarah Elkins, Noah Sussman, Jer Lance - Track: Tech, Life  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: none
